Articles.Content:
Everyone's posts always have 2 or 3 lines of white space after the last line of their post, but mine never do. Anyone know what's up?

- - - Updated - - -

Huh, the above post looks fine.

I'm talking about posts like this one

Edited October 9, 2015 by ev0

Very short posts like this or the one IÃ‚Â´m writing right now would be too short to let the username and his other dates appear at the side. So they are lengthened to let the user-specific data appear.

Oh, I see the pattern now! So if you have an avatar picture, or other info posted below your name, you will be more likely to have white space at the end of your posts as to allow space for all of that side bar stuff to be seen. Thanks!
